info.name: rwby.fanfiction.net
info.description: Per request of one my most frequent users (Thanks Ryden), I have expanded RWBY into fanfiction.net. If you are a user though I would like you to direct questions to my G+ account at https://www.google.com/+JonathanCypher. Thanks in advance. Also, please let me know if you'd like other fanfiction themes. They will look similar to this in title and style. Enjoy!
